title: 'RHONJ' Star Teresa Giudice's Husband Joe Says He Never Wanted to Marry Her in Season 10 Trailer
text:
"RHONJ" fans hold onto your hats because the Season 10 trailer dropped and shows the harsh reality of Teresa Giudice's life post-prison.

Fans got an inside glimpse at an intense fight between the Bravo star and her imprisoned husband, Joe, where he revealed he never wanted to say "I do."

Related:

'RHONJ' Star Teresa Giudice Shares Heartbreaking Post About Joe After His Deportation Appeal Was Denied

The tense argument went down via phone in front of their oldest daughter, 18-year-old Gia.

"Alright, like I even wanted to get married? No,” Joe is heard saying. "See what I get?" a frustrated Teresa tells her daughter.

That's when Gia explodes and yells back at her mom, "That’s your personal business with my father, so enough!"

Deportation:

In the clip, Joe also tells his family he's getting deported.

As The Blast reported, he's been in an Immigration and Customs Enforcement detainment center since March following his prison release.

Joe, who was born in Italy, moved to the United States as a child but never obtained his US citizenship.

Most recently, his request to be released until his court date was denied.

Saying Goodbye:

View photos

"I'm getting deported and that's all there is to it," he tells his family as Teresa breaks down crying.

The trailer cuts to another moment where Gia begins sobbing over the news.

"I don't know if I'm ready to let him go," she's seen saying with tears in her eyes.

Cheating Allegations:

Teresa also addresses cheating rumors in the explosive clip, which her co-star Margaret Josephs seems to be circulating.

"Teresa is cocktailing it up all night with some young guy," she tells Teresa's sister-in-law Melissa Gorga.

Joe's wife is seen confronting Margaret in the clip which ends in her throwing a drink.

Hey, at least it's not a table this time!

"RHONJ" Season 10 airs Nov. 6 at 9 PM ET on Bravo.
